Text.Name: SuperPart_Wolf_1
Text.Desc: A natural secret body of wolf Yaoguai, drastically increases the essence acquisition rate when devouring items, but the amount of essence gained will be significantly reduced.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the essence acquisition rate from devouring items.\n Drastically reduces the amount of essence gained from devouring items.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Wolf_2
Text.Desc: A natural secret body of wolf Yaoguai. Once achieved, it can drastically increase the physical strength and resistance to pain.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the physical cultivator's physical strength.\n Drastically increases the physical cultivator's pain endurance.
